content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(-29.5, 30.5)
- Boiler at position(-34.5, 30.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler
- Ensure there is no existing object in the way before attempting to place a boiler.

### Errors when placing boiler too far
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place a boiler, as the maximum distance is 10 tiles.

### Errors when connecting boiler and steam engine
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect pipes between the boiler and steam engine.

### Errors when the steam engine is not operational
- Check the connections and ensure that the steam engine is properly connected to the power network and has the necessary input liquid.
